content.text: 0) In a large bowl, combine the flours, sugar, baking powder, salt and caraway seeds.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:ppt ( "the flours"@28:38 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@40:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "baking powder"@47:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@62:66 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "caraway seeds"@71:84 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Combine the egg, milk and oil; stir into the dry ingredients just until moistened.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "the egg"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "milk"@20:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "oil"@29:32 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "stir"@34:38 / AC
		:ppt ( "the dry ingredients"@44:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until moistened"@69:84 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups two-thirds full.
4) Bake at 400 degrees F for 20-23 minutes or a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "400 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "20-23 minutes"@29:42 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-4-0 "a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean"@46:98 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Cool"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "5 minutes"@12:21 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-5-0 "before removing from pan to a wire rack"@22:61 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
